subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Maverick McNealy, a sophomore at Stanford, makes his United States Open debut with his father, Scott, the co-founder of Sun Microsystems, employed as his caddie.
snippet: Maverick McNealy, a sophomore at Stanford, makes his United States Open debut with his father, Scott, the co-founder of Sun Microsystems, employed as his caddie.
